about_the_game:
This is an expansion pack for the free to play game Neon Force Pushers, adding double the amount of stages to the base game. The stages included in this pack are Squirt Scuffle, Don't Drown, Beach Ballistics, and Lemon Leverage.

Squirt Scuffle is a stage filled with water pretty water fountains that will push the you high into the air! Use these streams of water to your advantage, or end up flying to your death!

Don't Drown is a flooded stage with water everywhere! Master the effects of your force push while above and below water, and don't forget to breath!

Play a nice deadly game of dodge ball in Beach Ballistics! Use your force push to to send hazardous beach balls flying towards your opponents, but be careful not to get hit yourself!

Lemon juice is actually very detrimental to your force pushing ability. It's true! Avoid being squirted by the lemon juice in Lemon Leverage, else you'll be left helpless without force pushing against your opponents!
